ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Gold Plated Koshigitana
ygData.msgSnippet: Just looks like a dagger. It would be a great weapon if not for 2 things. 1.  There are next to no summoned creatures in the game, at least at the level you re
ygData.messageBody:
Just looks like a dagger.
It would be a great weapon if not for 2 things.
1. There are next to no summoned creatures in the game, at least at the
level you're likely to obtain this weapon.
2. The proc rate on it is perhaps the worst I have ever seen. It hardly
ever goes off.


Elwyn


-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Thursday, March 09, 2000 2:43 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Gold Plated Koshigitana


From: <kim@...>

On Thu, 9 Mar 2000, Eric Boller wrote:
>
> This is a crappy weapon? It has one of the best
> damage/delays in the game! I guess if you compare it
> to a planar weapon but still! it is 9/25.

Out of curiosity, what does the graphic for it look like?
Since I've pretty much decided my weapons are decorations,
I've started thinking of getting distinctive looking weapons.
:)

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
